title: Your Song
content:
[G]G[C]C[D]D[Bmi]Bmi 
It´s a little bit funny, this feeling inside 
[Emi]Emi[Em/D]Em/D[Em/C]Em/C[C]C 
I´m not one of those who can , easily hide 
[G]G[D]D[B7]B7[Emi]Emi 
I don´t have much money, but, boy if I did 
[G]G[Ami]Ami[C]C[D]D 
I´d buy a big house where we both could live 
[G]G[C]C[D]D[Bmi]Bmi 
If I was a sculpter, but then again no 
[Emi]Emi[Em/D]Em/D[Em/C]Em/C[C]C 
or a man who make potions in a travelling show 
[G]G[D]D[B7]B7[Emi]Emi 
well I know it´s not much, but it´s the best I can do 
[G]G[Ami7]Ami7[C]C[G]G 
My gift is my song and this one´s for you. 
 
Chorus 
[D/F#]D/F#[Emi]Emi[Ami]Ami[C]C 
And you can tell everybody this is your song 
[D/F#]D/F#[Emi]Emi[Ami]Ami[C]C 
It may be quite simple but now that it´s done 
[Emi]Emi[Em/D]Em/D 
I hope you don´t mind, I hope you don´t mind 
[Em/C]Em/C[C]C 
that I put down in words 
  [G]G[C]C[C]C[D]D 
How wonderful life is while you´re in the world. 
 
[G]G[C]C[D]D[Bmi]Bmi 
I sat on the roof and kicked off the moss 
[Emi]Emi[Em/D]Em/D[Em/C]Em/C[C]C 
well a few of the verses, well they´ve got me quite crossed 
[G]G[D]D[B7]B7[Emi]Emi 
But the sun´s been quite kind, well I wrote down this song 
[G]G[Ami7]Ami7[C]C[D]D 
It´s for people like you that keep it turned on. 
[G]G[C]C[D]D[Bmi]Bmi 
So excuse me forgetting, but these things I do 
[Emi]Emi[Em/D]Em/D[Em/C]Em/C[C]C 
you see I´ve forgotten if they´re green or they´re blue 
[G]G[D]D[B7]B7[Emi]Emi 
Anyway the thing is what I really mean 
[G]G[Ami7]Ami7[C]C[D]D 
Yours are the sweetest eyes I´ve ever seen
